means: automatic diagnostic maintenance information retrieval (system) 自动诊断维护信息检索（系统）

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含"尊重，钦佩"之意。
means: admire ：侧重指对某人或某物的仰慕、钦佩，并含欣赏爱慕之情。
honour ：侧重指对某人或某物表示极大的敬意。
respect ：指对人的行为、品德、才华或成就等的仰慕尊重。尤指对年长或地位高的人的尊敬。
regard ：最正式用词，中性，含义不很明确，一般需用修饰语加强或明确其意。
esteem ：除表示尊敬之外，还暗示由此而产生的称赞。

sentence.Network_en: I had to admire David's vow that he would leave the programme.
sentence.Network_cn: 戴维发誓要离开这个项目，我不得不对他表示钦佩。

sentence.Network_en: We admire her dedication to the cause of humanity.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们敬佩她对人类事业的献身精神。

sentence.Network_en: We took time to stop and admire the view.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们特意驻足欣赏风景。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: from Latin admirari, from ad- 'at' + mirari 'wonder'

entry.def: If you admire someone or something, you like and respect them very much.

example.ex: I admired her when I first met her and I still think she's marvellous...
example.tran: 初次见面时，我就非常佩服她，时至今日我仍然认为她很出色。

example.ex: He admired the way she had coped with life...

entry.def: If you admire someone or something, you look at them with pleasure.

example.ex: We took time to stop and admire the view.
example.tran: 我们特意驻足欣赏风景。

auth_sentence.content: I admire people who have a lot of compassion.
auth_sentence.res_content: I admire people who have a lot of compassion.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I admire people who have a lot of compassion.

auth_sentence.content: I then headed out to admire the real thing.
auth_sentence.res_content: I then headed out to admire the real thing.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I then headed out to admire the real thing.

auth_sentence.content: But they understand me, and admire my skill.
auth_sentence.res_content: But they understand me, and admire my skill.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But they understand me, and admire my skill.

Sentence.sentence: It's possible to admire Oprah Winfrey and still wish Harvard hadn't awarded her an honorary doctor of law degree and the commencement(毕业典礼)speaker spot at yesterday's graduation.

means.word_mean: 赞赏; 钦佩; 仰慕

sentences.en: We admire his working so hard.
Don't forget to admire the baby.

jushi.english: The guests admired the beautiful blooms in the garden of their hostess.
jushi.chinese: 客人们很喜欢女主人花园里那些美丽的花卉。

jushi.english: You may not like him, but you've got to admire his persistence.
jushi.chinese: 你可以不喜欢他,但他的坚忍你却不能不佩服。

jushi.english: The works of Dickens are admired in China as well as in the rest of the world.
jushi.chinese: 像在世界其他地方一样,狄更斯的作品在中国也受到赞赏。
